name: collectionView(_:acceptDrop:index:dropOperation:)
desc: Invoked when the mouse is released over a collection view that previously allowed a drop.
declaration:
optional func collectionView(_ collectionView: NSCollectionView, 
                  acceptDrop draggingInfo: NSDraggingInfo, 
                       index: Int, 
               dropOperation: NSCollectionView.DropOperation) -> Bool
